mapper.select: select wta.id as id, wta.order_id as orderId, wta.task_id as taskId, wta.creator_id as creatorId, tps.name as creatorName, wta.upload_time as uploadTime, wta.file_url as fileUrl, wta.file_size as fileSize, wta.file_name as fileName from service.wf_task_attach wta left join property.t_property_staff tps on tps.id = wta.creator_id where wta.order_id = #{orderId} order by wta.upload_time desc
